text: Juan Martínez Brito (born May 17, 1958 in Guanabacoa, HavanaProfile at sportsreference.com) is a retired discus thrower from Cuba, who represented his native country at the 1992 Summer Olympics. His personal best is , thrown on May 21, 1983 in Havana. He was the winner at the AAA Championships in 1985.GBR Athletics - AAA CHAMPIONSHIPS (MEN) ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan = "2"|1976 |rowspan = "2"|Central
